main: ^The blue eagle: Im the blue eagle! the bluest eagle to ever exist!
^What do you know about lilac butterfly?
npc: ^The blue eagle: I know. But green eagle sounds boring.

c-0: ^The blue eagle: she took the artefact and wont tell anyone where it is

info2: ^The blue eagle: What do you mean?
^The blue eagle: Shes acting exactly how any of us would if someone stole our favourite toy and hid it from us.
